tasks.start_pg: WORKERS_ON_EMPTY_EVENTS_SLEEP_INTERVAL_MS=2000 PGUSER=postgresUser PGPASSWORD=postgresPW PGHOST=localhost PGPORT=5455 PGDATABASE=postgresDB deno run -A --watch=api/,backends/,registry/,runtime/,samples/,workers/ dev.ts
tasks.pgsql: docker run --name myPostgresDb -p 5455:5432 -e POSTGRES_USER=postgresUser -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgresPW -e POSTGRES_DB=postgresDB -d postgres
tasks.workers: PGUSER=postgresUser PGPASSWORD=postgresPW PGHOST=localhost PGPORT=5455 PGDATABASE=postgresDB deno run -A workers/main.ts
tasks.api: PGUSER=postgresUser PGPASSWORD=postgresPW PGHOST=localhost PGPORT=5455 PGDATABASE=postgresDB deno run -A api/main.ts
